task.summary: - Added corresponding VCF, Fasta and GTF files for testing - Created test_extract_sequence.py - Added features for test_extract_sequence.py into config.py
- Added string replacement for all variants
tests – all paths changed to relative paths - prettifying

transcript.py - Boyer-Moore search changed to the algorithm based on regular expressions
transcript.py - Boyer-Moore search changed to the algorithm based on regular expressions
units.py - algorithms for "+" and "-" strands were collapsed into 1 - added error handling when VCF reference does not match the genome sequence - added error handling in case of alterations/deletions
config.py – substituted pyensembl genome with manually created GFGenome test_codon_counts.py test_utr3_motif_counts.py test_utr5_motif_counts.py – corresponding changes
– fixed error with importing in tests
– added file UTR to gfeat and class FivePrimeUTRSeq into it - added folder UTR to tests and 3 tests to check class FivePrimeUTRSeq - added gtf file for the tests

– corrected retrieval of 5'UTR sequences and the corresponding tests – added obtainment of exons of 5'UTRs – corrected all the corresponding tests – added test_FivePrimeUTRSeq_getitem for FivePrimeUTRSeq.__getitem__() magic method
– added retrieval of 5'UTR sequences for the minus strand – added the corresponding tests
– added retrieval of 5'UTR sequences for the minus strand – added the corresponding tests
– added configuration file for testing FivePrimeUTRSeq – added gtf file for testing FivePrimeUTRSeq for a "-" strand
– added database creation in test files
- added - pip install 'pyensembl==1.1.0' and - pip install 'gtfparse==0.0.6' to .gitlab-ci.yml - refactored FivePrimeUTRSeq for "-" strand
- fixing the version of pyensembl and other required by it libraries in .gitlab-ci.yml
- file upstreamATG.py, added the following methods of class UpstreamATG: 1. constructor __init__(), predict_on_sample(), predict_on_batch() - added the corresponding tests cases
- file upstreamATG.py, added the following methods of class UpstreamATG: 1. constructor __init__(), predict_on_sample(), predict_on_batch() - added the corresponding tests cases
- fixed constructor of FivePrimeUTRSeq for reverse_complement_bool = False for minus strands - added predict_on_sample_with_pos to upstreamATG.py
- apparently 2 5'UTRs can have the same exonic sequences but different exonic+intronic sequences
- apparently 2 5'UTRs can have the same exonic sequences but different exonic+intronic sequences
